preprocess.fetch

Class MailFetcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • preprocess.fetch.MailFetcher

  • public class MailFetcher
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements a mail fetcher to fetch submissions from a mail account.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MailFetcher() 

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      This method should fetch submissions and return a Path to the downloaded attachments.

      • MailFetcher

    • Method Detail

      • fetchSubmissions

        public static java.nio.file.Path fetchSubmissions(java.nio.file.Path targetDirectory,
                                  java.lang.String mailServer,
                                  java.lang.String loginUsername,
                                  java.lang.String loginPassword,
                                  java.util.Date issuanceDate,
                                  java.util.Date dueDate,
                                  java.lang.String courseName,
                                  java.lang.String exerciseName)
                                           throws SubmissionFetchingException
        This method should fetch submissions and return a Path to the downloaded attachments.

        Remember to set targetDirectory, mailServer, loginUsername, loginPassword (encrypt using EncryptorDecryptor), issuanceDate, dueDate (you can parse them using formatter class), courseName and assignmentNumber correctly.

        Parameters:
        targetDirectory - the directory the submissions will be downloaded into
        mailServer - the server the mail account belongs to
        loginUsername - the username of the mail account
        loginPassword - the password of the mail account
        issuanceDate - the start time of the exercise
        dueDate - the deadline of the exercise
        courseName - the name of the course the exercise belongs to
        exerciseName - the name of exercise
        Throws:
        SubmissionFetchingException
